author.description: Kyle Flemmer | writer, publisher, digital media artist | http://objkt.com/profile/kflemmer

text: from "versetices," a series of /genart visual sonnets prepared for Doc(k)s, an international review of poetry mixing different mediums. "versetices" derives from a Python program i wrote to generate visual poems of a variable number of lines within a predefined space. this poem has 14 lines and is thus a visual sonnet.
